title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
notes: There's EasyAntiCheat in here, so that's the problem.

title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
notes: Tries to start, but then nothing.
Game launches and plays. Cannot play online matches. Completed levels are not updated on backend servers, no progression. Missing textures, some texture flashing.
title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon R9 200 Series (HAWAII, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.9-1-MANJARO, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 %command% in launch options, opting into "temporary_launcher_workaround". Game will launch without EAC. Trying to access online features will give you an in-game promt to quit the game (server response error). Minor graphical issues (loading in with mostly black/green/pink tinted screen or dense fog, resolved by waiting a bit or changing FOV if everything except for the HUD is black)
title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2

notes: To run game you must activate the beta version called "temporary_launcher_workaround". The game runs smooth, BUT the first time you enter a game it will stutter alot. It seems that whenever the game loads a new asset (like a new enemy type), it will make stutter/hang for half a second, probably doing some cache operations or similiar. After I played about 15 minutes it ran extremely smooth (GTX 970, with custom settings i had a stable 100 FPS). The problem however is that any operations requiring connection with online server will give you an error message and exit the game. So the only thing you can really do is play with bots. BUT, you won't be able to level up and after the game has finished you will also get the error message and be forced to close the game. So I give the game a bronze because the game itself works very good, but due to the EasyAntiCheat you can't really do much progress except than playing with bots and earn no XP/upgrades.
title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2

notes: Requires enabling temporary_launcher_workaround in betas, and launching the game using the option "Bypass launcher". The game runs fine, but nothing related to online works. Trying to launch multiplayer games or using any other online features will fail, because the game is not being launched with Easy Anti-Cheat.
title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
